entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Grand Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:01 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow mixed with ice pellets beginning late this evening then changing to ice pellets before morning. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Ice pellets or freezing rain. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Ice pellets changing to freezing rain mixed with ice pellets near noon. Ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Ice pellets mixed with snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Freezing rain mixed with ice pellets changing to ice pellets mixed with snow late in the evening and ending overnight then cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. High minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Cloudy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023
